Package com.flag4j.core

Class MatrixBase<T extends Serializable>

java.lang.Object
com.flag4j.core.TensorBase<T>
com.flag4j.core.MatrixBase<T>
Type Parameters:
T - Type of the storage data structure for the matrix. This common use case will be an array or list-like data structure.
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
ComplexMatrixBase, RealMatrixBase, SparseMatrixBase
public abstract class MatrixBase<T extends Serializable> extends TensorBase<T>

The base class for all matrices. A matrix is equivalent to a tensor of rank 2.

See Also:
Serialized Form
